page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {THIS PIECE OF WRITING IS A CONDENSED {EDITION OF A FAMILY MOVING HOUSE {DURING A HALF-TERM.IT IS WRITTEN BY {CRAIG HIND. When I got home on Friday I was so pleased to hear that my dad had fetched the keys to our new home. The next day, I helped strip the wallpaper off the walls and on Sunday my dad put new wallpaper on. I helped paint my bedroom in apple-white. It looks very nice. My sisters have had rose-white in their bedroom. They have had a pink carpet, I have had a beige one. We have a large garden. I mowed the lawn, Dad dug the border and mum planted bedding plants - all 148 of them.
